Name: Todd's Spider Dream
About the game: Welcome to Todd's Spider Dream, a 2D platformer set in Todd's never-ending nightmare. Slide and punch your way through the ghoulish spiders that haunt Todd in his sleep. As you get better, Todd's nightmare becomes worse.
